projects.subtitle: Learn about the initiatives transforming communities
projects.noProjectsDescription: We currently have no active projects. Check back soon to see our initiatives.
projects.exploreDescription: Explore all our active projects and learn how we are transforming lives

support.title: How to Support
support.subtitle: Your contribution makes a difference in the lives of many people
support.thankYou: Thank You for Your Interest in Supporting Us!
support.introDescription: Your support is essential to continue transforming lives and building a better future. Every contribution, regardless of its form, makes a real difference in the communities we serve.
support.noSupportDescription: We currently have no configured support methods.
support.bankDonationsDescription: Make direct transfers to our bank accounts. All donations are tax-deductible and you will receive an official receipt. Click on any card to copy the account number.
support.otherWaysDescription: Money isn't the only way to make a difference. Your time, knowledge, and resources are also invaluable to our projects. Explore these options to get involved.
support.receiptNote: Please send your transfer receipt to
support.questionsTitle: Have Questions or Want More Information?
support.questionsDescription: Our team is ready to help you. Whether you want to make a donation, volunteer, or learn more about our work, we're here for you.

footer.about: Transforming lives through education, health, and sustainable community development programs.
